description:
The ultimate smart bottle with a personal hydration coach.Introducing adidas x REBO smart bottle.
REBO is a stainless-steel smart water bottle that makes it easy to stay hydrated. REBO helps you achieve your hydration goals by sending you both in-app and visual reminders via the cap's LED ring. Based on your water consumption with the smart reusable bottle, the REBO app converts your efforts into funding the collection of plastic waste. REBO easily fits into your daily life, helping you unlock your hydration potential from home, to the office and to the gym.

name: Golf Monogram Socks
description:

We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future. 

Better Cotton is sourced via a chain-of-custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products, however, Better Cotton Farmers benefit from the demand for Better Cotton in equivalent volumes to those we "source." 

Find out more here: bettercotton.org/learnmore
